definitions.title: n.pr.terr.
definitions.body: = Upper Egypt, Paqourhv, faqourhv etc. (Egypt. p ((ĕ )-tĕ -res, south land) in As. Paturisi, Erman:ZAW x (1890), 118 f. Steind:BAS i.344 WMM:Hastings DB; also (on As.) Schr:KGF 283 f. Dl:Pa 310);—alw. in connexion with [[מִחְרַיִם]], etc.: Is 11:11, Je 44:15, Ez Eze 30:14, ´[[אֶרֶץ פ]]Je 44:1, Ez Eze 29:14; [[מִפַּתְרׂס]] prop. also Ps 68:31 (for [[טִתְרַפֵּס]]) Ne:JBL x (1891), 152 (plausibly), cf. Che:ib. xi. (1892), 125 Kau:Psalm Psalm crit. n..
